paper_abstract: The authors outline three goals to consider in building cyberinfrastructure to support scientific research and dissemination. They also present ResearchCompendia, a project designed to facilitate reproducibility in computational science by persistently linking data and code that generated published findings to the article, and executing the code in the cloud to validate or certify those findings.
paper_title: ResearchCompendia.org: Cyberinfrastructure for Reproducibility and Collaboration in Computational Science
